comment: Now the rage mob comes for Meat Loaf . For crying out loud quit demanding that everyone think alike , you Puritan Borg .

comment: Meat Loaf's predictions about climate have been far more accurate than scientists ' predictions about climate . Pro tip : Any " scientist " who predicted years ago that we'd all be dead in years is not a scientist , he's a propagandist .
amr:
# ::snt Meat Loaf's predictions about climate have been far more accurate than scientists ' predictions about climate . Pro tip : Any " scientist " who predicted years ago that we'd all be dead in years is not a scientist , he's a propagandist .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / predict-01
            :ARG0 (p2 / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Meat"
                        :op2 "Laf"))
            :ARG1 (c / climate)
            :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                  :ARG2 (a / accurate)
                  :ARG3 (m2 / more
                        :quant (f / far))
                  :ARG4 (p3 / predict-01
                        :ARG0 (s / scientist)
                        :ARG1 (c2 / climate))))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (s2 / scientist
                  :polarity -
                  :mod (a3 / any)
                  :ARG0-of (p4 / predict-01
                        :ARG1 (d / die-01
                              :ARG1 (w / we
                                    :mod (a4 / all))
                              :time (a5 / after
                                    :op1 (n2 / now)
                                    :quant (m3 / multiple
                                          :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                                :quant 1
                                                :unit (y / year)))))
                        :time (b / before
                              :op1 n2)))
            :op2 (p5 / propagandist
                  :domain s2)
            :ARG1-of (t2 / tip-05)))
